metadata.title: MYRU Lucky Cat Japanese Curtain Noren Japanese Curtain Doorway,33"x47"(Style C)
features: Package:1 panel Japanese curtain,not include Tension Rod
Material: polyester, Size:33" wide by 47" long
Suitable for home, doorway, office, restaurant, dinning Area, windows, kitchen, toilet, bathroom, bedroom, compound area and etc,used as Feng shuiand room divider.
The curtain will split into two parts when entering, which means bringing good luck.
Same Quality,but Lower Price. Save your money.
description: Japanese curtains, or "Noren", are ideal to create good feng Shui environments. The curtain will split into two parts when entering, which means bringing good luck.
